Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorzied person on the tracks at Harlem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorzied person on the tracks at Harlem. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
